name: Virus Attack (Lisa Buccheri)
description:
Virus Attack is a shooter game with a top down view and the goal is to kill as many enemies as possible. It was developed under Unreal Engine 4 in visual scripting. The player moves in an abandoned place in which appears waves of enemies that he has to kill. When he kills an enemy, he earns money with which he can buy bullets or life. When the player died, his score and his name is saved in the game if he is in the five first player.

I'm still working on it to add more weapons.
